verses.roman:
ebe antya-līlā-gaṇera kari anuvāda
'anuvāda' kaile pāi līlāra 'āsvāda'

synonyms: ebe—now; antya-līlā-gaṇera kari anuvāda—I beg to repeat all the facts of this Antya-līlā; anuvāda kaile—if it is repeated; pāi—I get; līlāra—of the pastime; āsvāda—taste.
translation: Now let me repeat all the pastimes of the Antya-līlā, for if I do so I shall taste the pastimes again.
